00005 #include <Magick++.h>

00007 #include "Recognizer.hpp"

00009 #include <iostream>

00022 int main (int argc, char const *argv[])
00023 {
00024     try
00025     {
00026         // Load an image object with the filename passed
00027         Magick::Image image( argv[1] );     
00028         
00029         // Create a Recognizer object from the image loaded
00030         Recognizer recon( image );
00031         
00032         // Execute the OCR process
00033         recon.obtainText();
00034         
00035         std::cout << "Background finding time      : " << recon.statistic().backgroundReferenceGrayLevelFindingTime() << std::endl;
00036         std::cout << "Threshold computing time     : " << recon.statistic().optimalThresholdComputingTime() << std::endl;
00037         std::cout << "Noise removal time           : " << recon.statistic().noiseRemovalTime() << std::endl;
00038         std::cout << "Preprocessing time           : " << recon.statistic().preprocessingTime() << std::endl;
00039         std::cout << std::endl;
00040                         
00041         std::cout << "Thresholding time            : " << recon.statistic().thresholdingTime() << std::endl;
00042         std::cout << "Segmentation time            : " << recon.statistic().segmentationTime() << std::endl;
00043         std::cout << std::endl;
00044         
00045         // Write results to the internal image
00046         recon.writeExternalImage( image );
00047                 
00048         // Create a new PNG image with the results of OCR process
00049         std::string filename(argv[1]);
00050         filename.replace(filename.find_last_of('.'), filename.size(), "Results.png");
00051         image.write( filename );
00052     }
00053     catch (std::exception &e)
00054     {
00055         std::cout << e.what() << std::endl;
00056     }
00057     return 0;
00058 }
